verse: मनसैवानुद्रष्टव्यं नेह नानास्ति किंचन॥ मृत्योः स मृत्युमाप्नोति य इह नानेव पश्यति॥
meaning: Through the mind alone, one can perceive that there is nothing here at all. He who does not perceive even a bit here, attains death.

upanishad-org.meaning: Through the mind must we understand that there is nothing in this world that really varies: who thinks he sees difference here, from death to death he goeth.
